settings.text: Help achieve nutritional goals and enhance whole body health with our customized ingredients plus naturally derived cannabinoids.

settings.title: Primary Benefits
settings.content:
This next-generation multivitamin can be an ideal supplement for any person who desires to lead a healthier & enhanced lifestyle, by helping promote:

+ Nutritional Efficiences

+ Boosted Cellular Energy

+ Enhanced Focus, Mood & Productivity

+ Healthy Aging & Longevity

+ Immune & Nervous System, Skin, Brain, Eye, Heart, Beauty & Whole Body Health

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.content:
We imbue 24 active, healthful ingredients into our multi+V including:

+ Built-in B complex for a healthy methylation cycle, which fuels cellular energy, brain function, cell metabolism and produce collagen. Vitamin B complex may help prevent infections and help support or promote: cell health and growth of red blood cells.

+ Fat Soluble Vitamins that function as antioxidants, thus supporting the immune system & preventing premature aging of cells.

+ Array Minerals to help keep your bones, muscles, heart & brain working properly. Minerals are also important for creating enzymes & hormones, while maintaining a proper balance of water in the body

+ Prebiotics & Probiotics help support gut health, digestion and absorb nutrients more efficiently.

+ Naturally derived Cannabinoids are a class of molecules that interact with cannabinoid receptors in the human body that can be used to help manage or support the symptoms of stress, chronic pain, inflammation, migraines, epilepsy, autoimmune diseases, depression & anxiety.

+ Fruit derived terpene "D-Limonene" acts as an antioxidant in the body, helping absorb and remove damaging free radicals before they can injure cells. Dietary limonene may help lower your risk of certain health issues and signs of aging by reducing the amount of oxidative stress on your body

settings.title: How it works
settings.content:
Take 1 ActiveCare Hybrid Multivitamin+ Gummy daily, at or around meal or snack time, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Store in a tightly-sealed, cool, dry place outside of direct sunlight. Keep out of the reach of children, who may mistake these for candy.

You can take our Hybrid Multi+ at any point in the day that works best for your needs. We recommend you take it at or around the time of a meal or snack because the natural absorption of essential fat-soluble vitamins is supported by the proximity of a meal or a snack that provides some fat content.

Since many of our clients find that our Hybrid Multivitamin+ gummies are energizing and promote mental clarity, most customers choose to take our multivitamins and mineral supplements in the morning, or midday, instead of near bedtime.

Ex: Shipping and return policies, size guides, and other common questions.

settings.name: Tiamin (B1)
settings.description: Thiamine plays an important role in converting carbohydrates into energy. Without thiamine, the nervous system can’t function and everyday abilities like walking, cognition and speech are impaired
